summary: Jazz is a music style that started in New Orleans, mixing African and European music. It's known for its unique rhythms, improvisation, and "swing." Since the 1920s, jazz has been big worldwide, evolving into many styles like swing, bebop, cool jazz, and fusion. Each style has its own sound and way of playing. For example, bebop is faster and more complex, while cool jazz is smoother. Today, jazz continues to change and include influences from different cultures.
title: Jazz
